title: Garam masala seared salmon with coconut-curry butter
ingredients: ['180ml dry white wine', '125ml double cream', '75ml coconut milk', '2 tablespoons curry powder', '225g cold, unsalted butter, cut into pieces', 'sea salt to taste', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '8 (150g) fillets salmon', '2 tablespoons garam masala', 'sea salt to taste']
